concatenate: A private booth has been set aside for Wraitheon charter captain and her retinue.  It's clear they are used to a certain level of comfort that is not met locally.

concatenate.yes: You recognize her near instantly, Rene Gliese, a low rank explorer and an absolute pain.  Its clear from her expression that she thinks very similar things about you.
concatenate.no: They have just dismissed a band of enforcers, quite rudely too.  If there's a chance for you to land some sort of deal, its probably now.

responses.text: Dont dare look me that way worm.  You'll greet me properly and then we will talk business.  Now.
Gliese, how "charming" to see you here, out of all places.  I'm surprised really, do you pick trash for leisure or are you
Approach the captain and her retinue, see if you can strike a deal.

dynamic_line.yes: My lord, so good to see you again.  I... I had no idea you would be here.  Forgive my earlier tone, I was taken aback.  How may I be of service to you today?
dynamic_line.no: My lady, it's an honor to see you again.  I... I had no idea you would be here.  Forgive my earlier tone, I was taken aback.  How may I be of service to you today?
